item.title: Tong Yang
item.description: Tong Yang (杨仝) (Google Scholar) received his PHD degree in Computer Science from Tsinghua University in 2013. He visited Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) China from 2013.7 to 2014.7. Now he is an associate professor in School of Computer Science, Peking University. Research Area: Network Big Data, Sketches, Network measurement, Bloom filters, IP lookups, KV stores, Hash tables, and etc. 常年招收本校或外校本科实习生, 欢迎优秀同学洽谈攻读博士学位. Email: yangtongemail@gmail.com PhD Students (博士): 樊卓宸(Zhuochen Fan), 赵义凯(Yikai Zhao ), 吴钰晗(Yuhan Wu), 杨凯程(Kaicheng Yang), 刘子瑞(Zirui Liu), 缪瑞杰(Ruijie Miao), 李元鹏(Yuanpeng Li), 郭嘉睿(Jiarui Guo), 陈齐治(Qizhi Chen)
